value:
$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|This Tempest...such life in it,
and yet...$k$pI sense a terrible distortion.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Princess Eir, it is good to see that you
are safe.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|It's Princess Fjorm, isn't it?$k$pYou are the one who is always by
$Nu's side...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What? Of course I'm not. I mean...
yes, I am sometimes. Obviously.
Why would I not be?$k$pWe're comrades—in battle. I must
stay close—it's nothing more!$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Nothing more?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm! Eir! There you are!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Sharena. I'm glad you're here.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I've looked all over this place for
signs of life, but it seems like it's
just us three.$k$p$EFace_Smile|That's perfect, though! A trio like us
will make short work of this Tempest!$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Are we...a trio now?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course we are! A trio of friends!
Wouldn't you agree, Fjorm?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|As a matter of fact, I do. I think this is
a great opportunity for us to bond.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|It just makes sense! We're princesses,
after all.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|The living certainly are...brimming
with energy.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Very well. You lead, and I will follow.$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|The Tempest is fading. Looks like
it was no match for this royal trio!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|It seems so. Shall we make our way
back, then?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I...$k$pSharena. Fjorm.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Thank you...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Huh? What for?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Smile|As long as I can remember, friends
are something I have gone without.$k$pBut you went out of your way
to befriend me. And for that...
I am grateful.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I'm glad to hear it, Eir! I was kind of
worried we were bothering you, just
because you're normally so quiet.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I apologize. I am not accustomed to
speaking with people.$k$p$EFace|In the realm of the dead, there is
seldom anyone to talk to. I have gone
whole years without speaking.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Eir...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Well, it's never too late to start, is it?
Fjorm and I will give you lots of
practice! Won't we, Fjorm?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Certainly. We need to keep the trio
together, after all.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you.$k$pThe living are so full of energy... It's
dazzling. Such warmth...$k$p
